p: Unlike pediatric ureteroscopes, the micro-ureteroscopy sheath allows us to work with laser fibers between 230 and 270 microns. There are no conclusive studies that relate the size of the fiber with the time required to spray a stone ( 12). We can find difficulties in breaking some types of stones such as cystine. However, pediatric stones are usually softer than adult ones. In our case, we have not found any problem to eliminate stones in an acceptable period of time.
